original: @29a * // dpal rdo rje rnam par 'joms pa la phyag 'tshal lo //üîΩsgom bzhi'i dkyil 'khor du dbang bskur bar 'dod pa'i sgrub pa po dam tshig dang ldan pas /

original: gnas yid dang mthun par sa'i cho ga la sogs pa sngon du song bas sgom bzhi'i dkyil 'khor bzhengs te /üîΩsa stegs dkyil 'khor gru gsum mnyam zhing chags kyis 'thas par byas te thig btab la tshon bkye ste /
analyzed: gnas yid dang mthun par sa'i cho ga la sogs pa sngon du song bas sgom bzhi'i dkyil 'khor bzhengs te / sa stegs dkyil 'khor gru gsum mnyam zhing chags kyis 'thas par byas te thig btab la tshon bkye ste /
translated: The practitioner who possesses the commitments and wishes to confer empowerment into the mandala of the four sessions should erect the mandala of the four sessions in a place that is agreeable, having first performed the earth ritual and so forth.üîΩThe mandala platform is a square with four corners, and the center is made even and smeared with a mixture of the five cow products.

original: dbus padma 'dab ma bzhi pa ste lte ba ljang gu padma rigs kyi mdog lte ba'i mu khyud nag po rdo rje rab dkar pos bskor ba /
analyzed: dbus padma 'dab ma bzhi pa ste lte ba ljang gu padma rigs kyi mdog lte ba'i mu khyud nag po rdo rje rab dkar pos bskor ba /
translated: Draw a four-petaled lotus in the center, with a green center, the color of the lotus family. The surrounding band of the center is black, surrounded by a vajra cross.

original: gong ras dmar po mu khyud ser po sna tshogs padmas mtshan pa /
analyzed: gong ras dmar po mu khyud ser po sna tshogs padmas mtshan pa /

original: sgo bzhi rta babs su yod pa bris la /

original: mtshan nyid dang ldan pa'i bum pa lnga la rgyan thams cad kyis brgyan pa /

analyzed: lha so so'i mtshan ma btab la so so'i gnas su bzhag / sgo bzhir phur bu bzhi la dar le brgan gyi con pan btags la gzugs /

analyzed: de dag gi snying gar zla ba'i dkyil 'khor gyi steng du so so'i ye shes sems dpa' spyan drangs la /

analyzed: bdag nyid kyis khrus byas la bzlas pa bya'o // aom dzra ye sv'a h'a /

analyzed: khri phrag re bzlas te stong gis mchod pa 'bul /
translated: Visualize each of the vases and recite each of the mantras ten thousand times. Make offerings with one thousand.

analyzed: spyan drang ba dang bzhugs su gsol ba dang / phyag btsal ba dang bstod pa re bya /

analyzed: de ltar bzlas pa byas la lha so so 'od du zhu chu bdud rtsir gyur pa las lha mo grangs med pa 'phros ba las /
translated: In this way, perform the recitation. Each deity melts into light and the water becomes nectar. Countless goddesses emanate from that.

analyzed: phyi nang gi dbang bdag la bskur bar dmigs la /

original: de nas ba lim gtang /

original: bkra shis gsol /
analyzed: bkra shis gsol /

original: dkyil 'khor bsdu /
analyzed: dkyil 'khor bsdu /

original: slob mas bla ma la yon dbul /
analyzed: slob mas bla ma la yon dbul /
